testcase.name: Find and book flight tickets
testcase.system-out: Given I am in the login page of the application.............................passed And I login using the valid username mercury and the valid password mercury.passed Given I search for flights using the following criteria:....................passed And I select the first available flight.....................................passed And I book the tickets using the following passenger details:...............passed And I use the following credit card details:................................passed Then I should get a booking confirmation with a confirmation number.........passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given I am in the login page of the application.............................passed When I login using the invalid username abc and the invalid password xyz....passed Then The application should stay on the login page, and not log me in.......passed

testcase.name: Register new user and login using the newly registered credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am in the login page of the application.............................passed When I register a new user with the following details:......................passed Then I should get a confirmation on successful registration.................passed When I click on the sign in link............................................passed And I login using the valid username icims and the valid password password-1.passed Then The application should log me in and navigate to the Flight Finder page.passed
